overview.business_description: German automotive supplier and one of the world's largest Tier 1 suppliers. Products include driveline, chassis, active/passive safety technology, and electronics. Acquired TRW Automotive (2015) and WABCO (2020).
business_positives: Global Tier 1 scale with broad product portfolio
Technology leadership in safety and chassis
Commercial vehicle exposure diversifies from passenger
Strong R&D investment in EV and autonomous
overview.fatal_flaw: High leverage from acquisitions; heavy auto cycle exposure; pension liabilities; family/foundation ownership limits capital access
overview.recent_news: Facing headwinds from European auto slowdown. Focus on cost reduction and portfolio optimization.

credit_opinion.summary: ZF faces significant challenges from the European auto downturn and elevated leverage. Negative outlooks from both Moody's and S&P signal downgrade risk. Cost restructuring is underway but execution is critical.
key_risks: Negative rating outlooks signal downgrade risk
